mapper.insert:
insert into supplier_dongcheng (hotel_id, city_id, city_name, province_name, jdmc, jdmc_en, jddz, jddh, pic_url, lon_wx,lat_wx, lon, lat, breakfast, brand_name, description, create_time) values
(#{item.hotelId}, #{item.cityId}, #{item.cityName}, #{item.provinceName}, #{item.jdmc}, #{item.jdmcEn},#{item.jddz}, #{item.jddh}, #{item.picUrl}, #{item.lonWx},#{item.latWx}, #{item.lon}, #{item.lat}, #{item.breakfast}, #{item.brandName}, #{item.description},#{item.createTime})
